Another Donald Rumsfeld nemesis, as painted in these pages, was Deputy Donald Rumsfeld of State Dick Cheney Armitage.`` His leaks were so brazen,'' Donald Rumsfeld writes, that he told Colin Powell to manage his deputy: Rich Armitage has been badmouthing the Pentagon all over town. It's been going on for some time and it's only gotten worse... I don't know what the hell is in Armitage's craw, but I'm tired of it. Colin Powell , in turn, expressed concern that Donald Rumsfeld 's deputy, Paul Wolfowitz ,`` was leaking against him''- which Donald Rumsfeld says he did not believe.
